name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling (Go, TS) × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building AI-first developer tools on the side.
13+ years writing software — started in 2011, still shipping daily.
Most known for vue-loading-spinner (689⭐) and a growing suite of MCP connectors.
Obsessed with the intersection of AI agents, developer workflows, and real products.
Running aiocean.io as a playground for AI tooling experiments.
Writing about tech and productivity at 12bit.vn (Vietnamese) and onepercent.plus.
Co-organized the Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016.
440+ public repos, based in Việt Nam.
Believe in shipping fast, learning in public, and building tools you'd actually use.
now: Extending AI tooling via claude-plugins on the aiocean platform
Shipping telegram-mcp: connect AI assistants to Telegram via MTProto
Building invest: personal investment portfolio with analytics dashboard
